alert.note: Alert for Kimble (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 4:42PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Kimble County through 515 PM CDT... At 441 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Yates Crossing, or about 5 miles northeast of Junction, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Junction and Yates Crossing. This includes Interstate 10 between Mile Markers 456 and 457. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Texas.
